name: Grinning Face
description: A classic smiley face with a big, open-mouthed grin. Expresses general happiness and good cheer.

name: Waving Hand
description: A hand raised in a waving gesture. Used to say 'hello' or 'goodbye'.

name: Red Apple
description: A ripe, red apple. Often associated with health, teachers, and New York City.

name: Rocket
description: A rocket launching into space. Represents speed, progress, and ambition.

name: Cat Face
description: The friendly, whiskered face of a cat. A favorite for cat lovers.

name: Pizza
description: A slice of pepperoni pizza. A universally loved food, perfect for sharing.

name: Soccer Ball
description: A classic black and white soccer ball. Represents the world's most popular sport.

name: Light Bulb
description: A glowing light bulb. Symbolizes a new idea, inspiration, or a moment of clarity.

name: Heart with Arrow
description: A heart pierced by Cupid's arrow. Represents falling in love or being lovestruck.

name: United States Flag
description: The national flag of the United States of America, also known as the Stars and Stripes.

name: Smiling Face with Sunglasses
description: A smiling face wearing sunglasses. Conveys a sense of cool, confidence, or ease.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A hand with the thumb extended upward. A gesture of approval, agreement, or encouragement.

name: Dog Face
description: The friendly face of a dog. Represents loyalty and companionship.

name: Hamburger
description: A classic hamburger with a sesame seed bun. A staple of fast food.

name: Basketball
description: An orange basketball. Used in the popular sport of the same name.

name: Laptop
description: A portable laptop computer. Represents work, technology, and connectivity.

name: Check Mark Button
description: A green square with a white check mark. Indicates completion, correctness, or confirmation.

name: Canadian Flag
description: The national flag of Canada, featuring a prominent red maple leaf.

name: Face with Tears of Joy
description: A face laughing so hard that it's crying. Used to show something is extremely funny.

name: Brain
description: A human brain. Represents intelligence, thinking, and knowledge.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical pineapple fruit. A symbol of hospitality and warm welcomes.

name: Musical Note
description: A single musical note. Represents music, singing, or a melody.

name: Thinking Face
description: A face with a hand on its chin, looking upwards. Indicates deep thought or contemplation.

name: Fire
description: A burning flame. Can mean something is literally on fire, or that it's 'lit' (excellent or cool).

name: Trophy
description: A golden trophy cup. Represents victory, achievement, and being a champion.
